functionDescription: The function creates a new Lua closure object. It allocates memory for the closure, initializes its properties, and sets its upvalues to NULL.

inputInterfaces.name: nupvals
inputInterfaces.meaning: Number of upvalues for the new closure

outputInterfaces.name: c
outputInterfaces.meaning: Pointer to the newly created Lua closure

outputInterfaces.name: ret
outputInterfaces.meaning: Return pointer to the Lua closure
